title: African style font?
content:
Hi does anyone know what the font used in this map is please? The one for the place names eg “Zambia”. If not could anyone suggest alternatives.

Many Thanks

Si

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090815180543im_/http:/typophile.com/files/zambia-map-sized_5275.jpg)
author: simundo

comments.content:
Hi Si,

that looks like [Adrian Frutiger](http://web.archive.org/web/20090815180543/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adrian%252BFrutiger)’s [Herculanum](http://web.archive.org/web/20090815180543/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/herculanum/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26seed%3D27%26dock%3D0%26size%3D230%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DZAMBIA%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga).  
F
